original_text: A man of Benjamin ran from the battle line and came to Shiloh the same day, with his clothes torn and with dirt on his head.
korean_text: 당일에 어떤 베냐민 사람이 진영에서 달려나와 자기의 옷을 찢고 자기의 머리에 티끌을 덮어쓰고 실로에 이르니라

sentences.original_text: A man of Benjamin ran from the battle line
and came to Shiloh the same day
and with dirt on his head
